info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty winds from convective showers will impact portions of Broadwater, south central Meagher, Madison, Jefferson and Gallatin Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 637 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from near Boulder to 9 miles north of Henrys Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Townsend, Boulder, Sheridan, Virginia City, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Whitehall, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Pony, Basin, Alder, Silver Star, Toston, Harrison, Big Sky, Cameron, and Waterloo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
